Okay so you want to be completly original with your choice. That's great

Okay now is it a man or a woman
11.title: Original charecter

111.content:
Here are the choices you have.

Jeff Donly a cool guy in his high school but not so smart. He is 17 and get all the girls.

Joey Le is a nerd who likes playing YU-Gi-Oh all day long. He is 16 years old and is also in to anime. Not very good looking. And all the girls think he's a noob.

John Westly- The basketball jock in his school. On the basketball team and have a girlfriend named Macy.
111.title: Males

choices: She asks you if you want another wish
She turns Sam into a pretty girl also
1112.content:
Your name is Joey Le. You found an old lamp in an alley on the way home. As you look at it, you sigh. Your life is filled with fantasy because you have little else to go on. The other kids at school think you are either odd or some kind of strange nub.

You amuse yourself by daydreaming that the lamp contains a real genie. To be funny you rub the lamp, and your jaw drops as you see smoke actually come out of the lamp! Sure enough, there is a pretty woman standing in front of you!

She smiles at you and says, "Yes, I am real, but no, don't think you will be allowed to have sex with me, I don't have to do that." You start to ask questions, but she cuts you off, "Don't be rude! I am not done yet! Now, you do get three wishes, but it is not like you think. You tell me what you want, and I make the wish for you. No exceptions! Other than killing someone, there are few limits. If you hit one, I will tell you. So what do you want for your first wish?"

You are drooling as you look at her! "Really! Oh wow! Um, a girl. I want a girl like Kari Tsukumo from YU-Gi-Oh, only with red hair and green eyes. I want to be able to touch her anywhere I want, any time I want, and she will make me popular in school!"

The genie smiled, "Hmmm. There is a lot to that wish, but popular, well that I can understand. The kids at school probably think you are a nub." That stung you. She goes on, "But you don't want to be. *Sigh* But you want to be able to touch this girls body any place you want any time you want? Hmmm." She paused, "Okay. I got it. Your first wish, coming right up!"

She did something you could not see, then the world began to spin around you. You had a hard time standing, but when it stopped, and you could see normally again, things were odd. First, as you looked around your room, it was very different. In fact, it was a girl's room! You could see a vanity with makeup, a pink bed and pink curtains on the window, and much more. You looked at the genie and start to ask, "Hey, what is goin..g… what is with my voice?"

You look down to see that you now have breasts! Long red hair flows around your shoulders! You reach between your legs and confirm, "I am a girl! You made me a girl! That is not what I wanted! Change me back!"

She shook her head, "Yes, it is what you wanted. In this body you will easily be popular, and the only way you can touch a girl anywhere you want anytime you want, is if you are in her body, so that fulfills your wish." She looks you over, "You are very pretty, but even if you want to, you can't undo a wish for twenty-four hours. You can make a new one though."

You look into the mirror and see a young, sexy girl staring back at you. You ask the genie, "How can I be a girl? What about Joey? What about my family? Nobody will know me."

She laughed, "You think my magic is that weak? Reality has changed. You were born a girl and named Kari, no Joey. So you have the same parents, but to them, you are and always have been Kari Le."

You feel your breasts, but what about my friends? What about Sam? How can he be my friend now?
1112.title: Joey Le

choices: will wait to make my next wish.”
11121.content:
“So is that your next wish? For your friend Sam to remain your friend while you’re a girl?” The genie asked.

“What? No! If I’m going to change back tomorrow, making Sam my friend as I am now would be a wasted wish.” Joey, now Kari, replied.

“So what do you wish for then? Or do you want to wait before making another wish?” She asked.

“I...I’m not sure yet.” Kari replied. ‘I have to be careful what I wish for, or she might twist the wish again.’

“Well?” The genie crossed her arms in impatience.

“I...”
11121.title: She asks you if you want another wish

choices: She felt deep love for the boy in the photo and became slightly aroused
She felt no new emotions towards her friend-turned-boyfriend
11122.content:
“Why would you want Sam as a friend? Are you going to use the classic ‘let’s just be friends’ line?” The genie asked.

“What? Why would I use a line like that?” Joey, now Kari, asked, before gasping in realization. “D-did you make Sam into my boyfriend?! Gross!”

“You’re right, he is your boyfriend, and he’s much more handsome than before, so you both are better off now. Breaking up with such a nice boy like him would be a mistake. He could be ‘the one’ after all.” The genie smirked.

“Th-the one?! B-but we’re both guys!” Kari exclaimed.

“Come on, even you know the differences between the male and female anatomy. Do you even remotely look like a guy now?” The genie asked.

“W-well, no, but I still have the mind of a guy!” Kari insisted.

“Well at least take a look at your new bf, you might like what you see.” The genie pointed at a picture frame sitting on the nightstand next to her bed. A picture frame that definately wasn’t there before her wish. Kari was about to protest, but glimpsed at the photo in the picture frame anyway.
11122.title: She makes Sam your boyfriend

choices: Kari gets  unbelievably horny and in love for Sam
Sam is change to the girl of Kari’s dreams
111222.content:
“Is this Sam?” Kari asked

Yes. What do you think? The genie asked

“ well he looks better than before but i’m not attracted to him “

“Oh. Well maybe I can change that .” The genie said

“What do you mean?”
111222.title: She felt no new emotions towards her friend-tur...

choices: “She has an unhealthy obsession with sex.”
11123.content:
“You mean Samantha? I think she prefers Sammy these days.” The genie replied.

“Samanatha? Sammy?” Joey, now Kari, asked. “You turned Sam into a girl too?!”

“Well I assumed you would want to keep your friend around, and it makes you more popular if you have attractive friends.” The genie replied.

“Wait, attractive? Sam wasn’t attractive. What’s he look like as a girl?” Kari asked.

“See for yourself. There a picture of you and your bff right there on your nightstand.” The genie pointed at a picture frame on the nightstand. Kari looked at the picture and saw her new girl self with one arm around a very attractive blonde girl, who had her own arm around Kari, and both girls had bright smiles on their faces.

“Does Sam remember being a guy?”

“Sammy isn’t the one who found my lamp, so no. In fact, she’s a bit of a bimbo for some reason. Trust me, I didn’t intentionally make her that way. Her personality was merely changed to what it would’ve been if she was born a girl and grew into an attractive young woman.”

“I’m almost afraid to ask, but what’s Sam’s new personality like?” Kari asked nervously.
11123.title: She turns Sam into a pretty girl also

142.content: This movie was seen on TV a few times and from a book. How about Hermione Granger from the Harry Potter books/films. I could see the genie interacting with her. Draco better not call the Genie a mudblood.
142.title: Female---Hermione Granger

1421.content:
This will happen in the beginning of her third year at Hogwarts. (it is for those who remember Harry Potter).

Hermione was in the library, looking for new books to read. She came across one on genies. She knew that they were far more powerful than wizards, even one of the most powerful ones,like Merlin of years past. Hours past while she read. She even found a small two paragraphs on self -wishes genies. Hermione thought that was interesting since many 'masters' do not always make wise decisions even with genies prompting.

She thought that if she had a genie, a self wishing genie would be best. The next best would be one who would counsel her first before granting a wish. The library was about to close before she left to go back to the common room in her Gryffindor House. Hermione gathered her belonging and headed that way.

On the way there, Hermione noticed an open door in the Ancient Runes Studies room. She was drawn inside by a voice. Hermione said curiously Hello, is someone calling my name? There were no response. Hermione started to leave when she saw a lamp in a box near the closet. Hermione deduced correctly that it was a genie lamp. She walked back there to examine it some more. After a minute of pondering, Hermione said ' hope that I am making the right decision.' and opened the cork to the bottle.

Hermione stood back behind some desks while an orange smoke appeared that transformed into the self wishing genie.. the genie that appeared looked like
1421.title: yes, let us do Hermione.

choices: Ron who wanted someone to play Wizard's Chess with him.
Neville who needed some help in Potions class.
14211.content:
A girl with long brunette haired practically popped out of the bottle wearing, at first, an middle eastern outfit. When she saw hermione however, her clothes changed into an Hogwart's uniform. She smiled at the confused girl and said 'Relax, master, I am not here to harm you but to help you. Nobody can see me unless I feel that it is best that he/she will see me.'

Hermione nervously said ' Hi. I'm glad that I freed you but I'm rather uneasy about making any wishes. I read enough on genies to know things can backfire." She paused 'Say, I need to call you something else beside genie. We already have a student named Ginni but she is not a genie. It was a name her parents gave her.'

the genie said 'Well, call me Minnie instead.....As for wishes, I am a different genie. I am a self wishing genie. I make the wishes on you.' She giggled a little at the grizzy haired girls expression 'I can grant wishes for you wishout you needing to say 'i wish'.'

Hermione said ' Please do not make me into a frog or something like that.'

Minnie the Genie laughed and said ' don't worry about that. I am here to help....First let me fix your buck teeth and that nest you call hair.

With a wave Hermione teeth became normal and straight, plus her hair de-frizzed and was much easier to manage.

Hermione smiled at the change so far and said ' Thanks, I feel better about myself. I study so much so I can be prepared for almost anything. Want to come back with me to the Gryffindor Common Room awhile. I need to study for potions class there. Snape is tough and hard to please.

Minnie smiled 'Sure.and know that I am a genie..I can do so much for you that I think that you may like it.'

Back at the common room Hermione was studying. Soon she was naturally interrupted by.....
14211.title: another Hogwart student her age

choices: tried tripping her with a spell
142112.content:
While Hermione was studying for her potions class, Neville walked in from the library in tears. Hermione noticed it and asked him about what was wrong.

He tried to dry his tears and say ' I was trying to understand this Potion class material but I just don't seem to get it or/and I can remember all those steps in brewing it. I usually seem to blow them up or melt my pot half the time.

Hermione smiled and said ' Want me to help tutor you some more. ' Neville nodded.

Hermione motioned the seat next to her and said ' We are on Chapter 2 now in Potion 301. Let us see what you know so far.'

[Minnie smiled. She sort of liked Neville during the next 15 minutes of studying]

After a while, Hermione had trouble explaining the more complicated part of Potions to Neville even though he was truly trying to understand. She frowned. She knew that part of the problem was Snape's cutting remarks and the taunts from the Slytherins. Hermione knew how words can hurt people She hated being called a mudblood by the Sytherins. Hermione thought 'Minnie, help me help Neville in this.'

Neville tried to concentrate when Hermione tried a different tactics. Slowly but surely Neville began to understand the topic better along with some memory tricks. After almost a hour of tutoring, Neville and Hermione felt comfortable in his understanding of Potions better. Neville apologized for taking up her time. But Hermione said ' Hey, I am happy to help my friends. I am sure that you would have helped me too.' Neville smiled and nodded. He said ' well, I better go and let you study before the evening meal comes. Thanks again.' Then he left.

Hermione studying the rest of the afternoon alone until the evening meal bell rang. Then Hermione came downstairs to join her classmates for the meal. At the entrance to the Great Hall,, Draco Malfoy saw her and
142112.title: Neville who needed some help in Potions class.

1421121.content:
Fortunately Minnie was following Hermione in her invisible state. Minnie noticed the hex that Draco was attempting on Hermione. In a split second, Minnie guided Hermione in an incredible cartwheel spin like an Olympian gymnast. Hermione did have a brief stumble at first but it was barely noticeable. After her spin was completed and she landed on her feet without injury and gave a small muscular flex afterward. Hermione knew that Minnie just gave her a new skill.

Everyone at the Gryffindor table cheered. Ron was starstruck and said "That was bloody amazing!" Hermione just blushed and said "well, I couldn't just let Draco trip me."

Some of the Gryffindors and Hufflepuffs glared at Draco but did nothing since there were all in the Great Hall for dinner. Draco was furious at the 'mudblood' who outwitted him. He was planning on challenging her to a duel. But he wanted to secretly hone his skills first. Fortunately nothing else happened at dinner or the rest of the night.

The next day started out normally until it was time for the DADA class with Professor Lupin. Again, Minnie was there in her hidden state. However there was something about Lupin that seemed wrong. But she knew that Lupin had no ill feelings against Hermione and was actually teaching the class well. (as the readers of the HP books knows, Lupin is a werewolf-although NOT by choice)
----Does Minnie know this?

The next thing Buffy knows she is surrounded by smoke and when it clears she is coughing. Once she's done she looks around to see what had happened and as she moves she hears a crinkle and looks down. Looking down Buffy notices a bulge in her pants, so Buffy pulls her pants down and sees she is now wearing a diaper.

What happens next?

151112.title: Something else

choices: See's a dusty lamp among trash (cliche)
1511121.content:
Ron was ragging his feet home.

His parents had told him that unless he'd get at least a B on last nights homwwork assignment when he wouldn't be allowed to go to Beuno Nacho for a whole week. He'd begged them to ground his for a year, or take away aall his videogames. Anything but no beuno nacho but they'd stayed firm in his punishment.

He held up the paper and stared at it. A Large red D staring back at him. It honestly wasn't his fault this time. Well okay it was a littl bit his fault. He should have known from last time that queestioning Barkin only resulted in more homework and man did he do some questioning yesterday. His bag was full to bursting as he'd been given more worksheets than there were pages in the oxford dictionary. Seriously I really mean that.

He'd stayed up all night last night at his parents insistance and actually managed to get it done. It wasn't the best work considering doing that much homework in less than a day you couldn't really aford to go into incredible depth. Unfortunatly that was not how Barkin saw it. It was like for every sentence that Ron wrote Barkin expected a dictionary's worth of words. Even though others handed in their homework had the same or slighty more written down than Ron himself. It just proved that Barkin was out to get him. So after walking Kim home as she talked about how easy the assignment was (for everyone else) he was trudging home.

His parents wouldn't understand of course. Well his father could since the Stoppable men had always had unplesent experiences with the Barkin's for over a hundred years. His mom though always seemed ready to tear into him for any mistake he made. Completly ignoring oR downplaying his success's. To her he was like a mistake she seemed eager to remove.

He sighed deeply and continued to march towards his fate. Little did he know that in the next few seconds that something would happen that would change his life for better, or worse.

More than likely worse though.

'Okay so how does Ron come across the genie
1511121.title: Ron stoppable

choices: A bored ordinary looking guy playing a gameboy
15111211.content:
He was so deep in his funk that he didn't even notice the garbage in front of his neighbours house until he walked right into it.

He tripped and landed stomach first on the concrete but throwing out his hands so save his face. A car then drove by and went threw a puddle soaking him and his paper.

He growled in an annoyed tone at the way his day was going. He was about to walk away when he stopped and looked at the garbage. If he didn't pick it up he knew the old man how lived here blaming him even though he wouldn't know if he'd done it or not. He'd just been blaming Ron ever since he was born and had a kid in the neighbourhood to yell at.

He grudginly picked up the garbage. Fortunatly nothing fell out the cans but the lid's had fell of letting the stink reach out and strangle his nose. He was about to put the lid on the last one when he noticed something catch his eye. He reached in and pulld out an old oil lamp like you'd see a genie pop out of. Covering the last of the can's he looke at the lamp strangly as he continued to his house next door. He unlocked the door and headed up to his room the lamp in one hand and his wet paper in the other. He put the paper over the radiator in hopes it would dry and looked at the lamp before smiling a little.

"Ha ha. The way today's going I 'd really need a genie." He said just before he gave it a rub like aladdin for a laugh.

What he did not expect from his little aladdin imitation was to get an Aladdin like reaction. Smoke starts to poor from the tip of the lamp in great volume and fill's his room. lightning dtarts to arc in the smoke like thunderclouds just before a great wind appreaered out of nowhere and sweeps the smoke into a cone.

Ron duck's behind his bed for cover while peeking out to see the result.

As suddenly as it appeared with one last great flash of mini lightning the cloud disipeare and standing there was
15111211.title: See's a dusty lamp among trash (cliche)

151112111.content:
Ron stared weirded out by what he saw. He hardly expected an actual genie to pop out of the lamp.

Not that this was his idea of a genie. He'd expected a girl in a belly dancers outfit or a big blue guy with no feet. Not this guy who looked like he lived in a videogame store. He was wearing an Everlot T-shirt had slicked back gelled hair and playing an old gameboy.

"Um excuse me." He sad nervously.

The genie looked up at him briefly. A loud noise was heard from the gameboy before he looked down and turned off the old hand held with an annoyed expression.

"Hey dude. You my new master?" He asked in a surfer voice.

"U h yeah. You really a genie? I was expecting someone a little more girly or another colour mabye." He said. The genie rolled his eyes.

"Oh man don't get me started. I tried the whole 'big ghost' genie thing when I started around 2,000 B.C. I went with a good shade of red for my skin. But after a while when the master's started to get less and less till we were lucky to get one a century we got together and decided we didn't need to put in the effort anymore and just do the buisness without any of the flash."

"You call a mini thunderstorm Not flashy?" Ron said incredously.

"It came with the lamp. I can't turn it off. Names Bob by the way" The genie replied.

"Bob the genie?" He said with an eyebrow raised.

The genie just looked at him annoyed. "Hey you want your lifetime of wish's to get started or not."

"Okay okay I'm." He stopped as he mentally went over what Bob said. "Lifetime of wish's. What happened to three?"

"Okay here's the thing. As soon as the wish's stop I get sucked into the lamp and sent somewhere until someone else worthy find's me. Which is why I was in the trash by the way."

"I was wondering why a solid gold lamp was in the trash." Ron butted in. Bob nodded.

"Exactly. So anyway I like the outside world a lot. Last time I was out I got myself a gameboy. Of course I've been playing only 'Tetris' for the past ninteen years. That's why last time I was out I mad sure to get this baby on the lamp." He pointed to an amulet shaped object that was clear;y not part or the lamp's deisign. "As long as this baby is there I can grant unlimited wish's so no getting sucked back into the lamp for me." He said with a goofy and happy smile.

Ron's head was spinning. Thos was eactly what he needed. Just a few word's and all his problem's woud disipear. Starting with that bogus D.

"When what are we waiting for let's get those power's warmed up. I wish..." He was stopped as Bob made warding gesture's.

"Whoah, whoah what are you doing?"

Ron stratched his head. "Um? Making a wish?"

Bob shoke his head with a small smile like he'd just been told a joke. "You dude do not make the wish's. I do."

"Huh?" Was the intelligent response. Bob sighed and went back to explanation mood.

"Back when master's made the wish's it alway's fell into a pattern.

1.Something small like food to prove were real.

2. Big changes that alway's ended up blowing up in there faces.

3. when wish to goes wrong they wish they'd never met us.

We got a little sick of this routine and tired of always having to clean up like nothing ever happened in the first place so we made up this new rule about the genie's making as well as granting the wish's. That way we don't have to waste our time resetting reality 'every time' we get out. The only restriction I have is that all the wish's I make have to have something to do with you."

"Okay then. What do I wish for first then?" Said a slightly confused Ron.

Bob said "Your paper's dry." He said as the soaking paper suddenly became bone dry. Ron grabbed for the paper with a small smile. Until he noticed the big fat D still in place.

"Hey what give's?" Said the young Stoppable in an annoyed tone.

"Sorry dude I can't use magic to change your grade. That'd be cheating." Bob said in complete honesty

"Man don't tell me this is gonna be like that show with the Fairy God parent's?" Her said in a mopy voice.

"No but dark forces way stronger than anything I could ever whip up already control the eduacational system. I touch that letter and I can kiss my rear goodbye." Bob explained.

Ron hung his head. Mabye a genie wasn't going to be such a good thing after all.
151112111.title: An ordinary guy with a gameboy

1511121111.content:
Ron stood with his head pressed against his locker.

He'd been absolutly correct about his parents reacions. When his dad saw it he looked at his son and plainly said "Barkin?" When Ron nodded his father smiled as he understood. His mother however took this oppertubity to dig into his self asteem while Hana sat in her lap. Saying he was just to lazy, the teacher had good reason not to like him, ecetera, ectetera. So now thanks to her he was grounded for a week and had to spend all that time studying.

"You my friend look to be in a serious funk." Came the california surfer voice of his new self wishing genie. The gamer genie in question was leaning up against the lockers while deply concentrating on his new 'duel screen' handheld which he'd discovered recently and was now completly addicted to 'new super mario bros'.

"Rrrrrghh." Ron growled. Bob ignored it.

"Ah ah remember boss only you can interact with me. Wouldn't want anyone to think your going crazy now would we."

Ron just kept growling for another second or so then stopped. He'd found out the hard way that only he could see or even touch the genie when his dad came home from work and walked right through Bob.

"You okay Ron? you seem a little tweaked." His best friend since childhood said from the side of him opposite the genie.

Ron lifted his head from his locker and looked at Kim. This morning when they met up to go to school had another unpleasant experiance to add to his recent collection of bad experiances.

Namely Bob had the hot's for Kim.

He kept giving her cheesy pick up lines and comments all the way here even though he knew she couldn't see or hear him. It only served to annoy Ron further.

"Yeah Kp. Just a little tired after the grilling Mom gave me last night. Dad understood. Why does my Mom alway's have to alway's make me feel worse than I already so?"

"Cause she's a bitch." Said Bob. Ron had to concentrate not to yell at him and keep facing Kim. Whose face softened and turned into a smile.

"Mom's alway's have high expectations of their kid's it only natural that she'd be annoyed that you almost failed.."

'Then why does she ingore me when I do something right?' Ron thinks " Thank's KP.

The girl smiled befor heading off down the hall to her next class. Leaving Ron alone with his genie in the hallway.

"Nice girl." Bob said as he completed level 3-4 in his game.

Ron spun on his heel and stared at the genie.

"You mad dude?" He said without looking up from the game.

"Mmm let's see. You almost let me convince my parent's that I'm crazy, anything I want to wish for you can't grant, You make cat call's and chessy pickup lines towards my beast friend and you bag on my Mom so yes I'm a little tweaked."

"In my defense she is hot." Said Bob.

Ron's heated glare could be felt even though he wasn't looking up. "Ok youre angry. How about I take care of that for you?"

"What youre going to magically take it all away?" Said Ron. Not entirelly objecting to that idea.

The genie snorted. "Were's the fun in that. Your stress reliever should be walking through in the next three, two, one, over there." He said and tilted his head in one direction.

Ron looked over nd was surprised to see Amelia. His not too secret crush and currently the hottest girl in school if the list in the guy's bathroom was anything to go by.

"Amelia? She's my stress reliever? C'mon what's she gonna go the only time's she even notice's I'm alive is when I got rid of my Ronness withthat haircut and when I was rich?"

"Cause you have something even better than money and fashion sense." He paused briefly and looked up from his game. "Magic."

He looked over to Amelia as she was walking down the hall. "Hey Amelia. Get over here." He called.

The girl went from walking right down the hall to walking over to the boy's and standing right in front of Ron.

The boy gulped. He glanced out of the corner of his eye as he saw the genie smirk right before he heard the word's "Kiss him.".

The blonde eye's widened to the size of plate's as the most popular girl in school pressed him up against his locker with her body and procedded to make out with him right in the empty unmonitered school hallway. He tried to push her off for a few seconds before giving up when her grip on him seemed to be like the grip of superman. Completly unbreakable. Next to him the genie was giving instruction's to her while continuing to play the DS.

"Keep going, keep going, harder, keep going and stop." He said right before the girl unattached her lips from his.
"Now wink." She winked at him. "And walk away." She resumed her walk as if nothing ever happened.

Ron went from seriously stressed to seriously frazzled. " Better?" Asked the genie.

Ron nodded dumbly befor gathering his wit's. "What the hek was that? I thought genie's couldn't make anyone fall in love." The respone from Bob for a short burst of laughter.

"Where'd you get that idea? A movie? Listen my friend despite what Holywood tell's you about genie's there actually is 'NO' restriction on our powers only what we don't mind and what we mind doing. Beside's I didn't make her love you I just wiped her mind for a little bit and took control. She'll get to class and won't remember anything."

Ron looked after the direction the girl had taken f in. "So you didn't make her my girlfriend or something?"

"Do you want me to make her your girlfriend?" The genie said. Ron made wild warding gesture's. "Good now I do believe that thank's to my helping you you are now late for class."

"Ron looked at his watch and yelped before taking down the hallway at near warp speed. Bob just stayed were he was. "This guy's gonna be a lot more fun than that Gates kid 40 years ago."

He made a face as he lost a life in the game. "Damn this is more addictive than Tetris."
1511121111.title: The next day at school

choices: She said   just call me Genie. easy to remember.
She said   Just call me Lindsey, I always liked that name.
151112112.content:
Ron rubbed his eyes. He was expected a hollywood type genie but not a teenage girl with purple hair. Plus she had a dojo outfit with a black belt on her that seemed to be decorated with lightening. She was performing some advanced yoga moves. Her abs were almost like a 6 pac.

Ron gasped in near fright. ' Oh no, am I doomed, who are you '

The girl stopped her moves and said ' Finally, I was doing this for stress relief off and on for decades. Good thing that I did not forget the training. Guess you are my new master.---What is your name, master.'

Ron stuttered R-R-Ron.

The genie said Hello R=R-Ron.

Ron said' No, I was just nervous ..it is Ron. What name should I give you?

All right, first up is the lovely Excel series! Chock full of craziness, zaniness, and a little bit of habenero pepper, this anime's got a heroine who's just dying*cough*Hyatt*cough cough* to be healed, and her crazy friend Excel, the hyperactive master of failure!

Following this is the calmer Rurouni Kenshin series. With a hot-tempered female dojo master, a determined kid trying to weave his way through the ranks of swordsmanship, a lustful doctor's daughter, a lazy birdheaded fight merchant, and an ex-assassin-gone-gentle-house-guest-and-resident-sword master, this one will have all you need for a smorgasboard of twisted wishes.

info.brief_description: You finds a genie that grants limitless wish's. But only grants wish's it makes itself
info.description:
The main charecter finds a genie. Unfortnatly the genie only grants wish's that he/she makes themselves. The wish's are alway's to do with you in some way or another but you have no say in what the wish is.

This story is rated 18+ because as long as the guidlines are followed you are free too enter whatever you with into the story.

Here are a few guidlines.

1. No killing charecters or graphic violence.
2. No Gay or Lesbian content.
3. Do not force one path of a story. If you cant think of anything for a second option please put 'something else'
4. Do not end the story after a few chapters. At least 20 or more before ending that story line
5. I reserve the right to edit or remove any content that does not follow the guidelines
6. The wish's made must relate in some way to the charcerter who found the genie.
7. Other than those resrictions their is no limit to what you can do.
